pullrequest.title: Allow rotorcraft to launch from ground vehicles

content.raw: I would remove this line and return false instead. It's a corner case but imagine that a robot is already docked and tries to dock for a second time to a different (and not close enough) ground vehicle. It we set `this->rotorDocked = false`, it will release the robot.
content.html: I would remove this line and return false instead. It's a corner case but imagine that a robot is already docked and tries to dock for a second time to a different (and not close enough) ground vehicle. It we set this->rotorDocked = false, it will release the robot.
